Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.1 Paṭiccavāra » 2.1.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma » Naāsevanaduka
Catukka
Kusalattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Naāsevanaduka
Catukka
378Naāsevanapaccayā nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, kamme ekaṃ, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, jhāne ekaṃ, vippayutte ekaṃ, atthiyā ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Tikaup Nakammaduka >>
